price: Ga waɗan da ba su yi ĩmãni* da Lãhira ba akwai sifar cũta kuma ga Allah akwai sifa mafi ɗaukaka. Kuma shi ne Mabuwãyi, Mai hikima.
arabic: لِلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ مَثَلُ ٱلسَّوۡءِۖ وَلِلَّهِ ٱلۡمَثَلُ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
footnotes: * Ƙãrin bãyani ne ga abin da ya gabãta kuma na bãya da shi ya rãtayu da shi, shiryarwa zuwa ga halãye maɗaukaka ni'ima ce babba.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lilladhīna lā yu'minūna bil-ākhirati mathalu al-sawi walillahi al-mathalu al-aʿlā wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
